Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: babysitting \babysitting\ n. the work of a baby sitter; caring for children when their parents are not home. [WordNet 1.5]
baby sitting n : the work of a baby sitter; caring for children when their parents are not home [syn: {babysitting}]
baby-sit v : work or act as a baby-sitter; "I cannot baby-sit tonight; I have too much homework to do" [syn: {sit}] [also: {baby-sitting}, {baby-sat}]
babysitting n : the work of a baby sitter; caring for children when their parents are not home [syn: {baby sitting}]
